name: Burg_460
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with nautical terms
local rites tied to tide cycles and reagent runs
diet: salted fish, seaweed, preserved goods
informal barter culture for imported reagents
constraints: no true resurrection or life-replacement magics
long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: state unspecified; likely coastal or small island
population unknown; functions as supply/relay for rituals
tech: near-medieval to early industrial with localized ritual magic
